programme.title: The Bay "Through the Seasons"
programme.desc: A introductory look at the multiple Emmy Award winning hit drama The Bay through the seasons. Plus, James Preston video "Dance with You"

programme.title: The Bay
programme.sub-title: The Bay "The Garretts of Bay City"
programme.desc: S1:E1 Sparks fly between Pete and Janice. Steve puts Nathan in his place. Lianna gets a rude awakening from Damian. Zoey takes a risky chance. Janice receives an unsettling call. Someone follows Zoey.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E2 Janice gets an unexpected call. Orchid continues her tormenting behavior. Lianna returns to old habits. An unexpected visitor agitates Jack. Sara squares off with her arch-nemesis.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E3 Steve makes headlines. Jack visits Sara. Pete surprises Janice. Will surprises Lianna. Lex and Steve clash. Shocking news awaits Marly. Pete and Janice are caught off guard.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E4 Kenneth warns Jack. Manny grills Pete. Janice is hit with reality when Marly pays a visit. Steve surprises Lianna. Blackwell calls Katherine before Elliot arrives. Lex demands Sara give answers.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E5 Marly confides in Manny. Janice and Pete attempt to fight the inevitable. Blackwell hopes to team with Elliot. Pete takes a daring chance. Zoey finds herself in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E6 Lianna tempts Lex. Blackwell vows revenge. Sparks ignite between Will and Lianna. Pete comforts Janice. Orchid and friends make a surprise entrance. Lex discovers a secret!

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E7 Sara has a provocative dream. Pete turns on the charm. Will flips the switch. Mack gets devastating news. Blackwell makes demands. Sofia stands firm. Jack’s rendezvous takes an abrupt turn.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E8 Peter and Janice give in. Zoey confronts Nathan. Mack and Will deliver devastating news. Blackwell delivers a harsh warning to Steve. Lex tells Sara he knows her secret.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E9 Damian’s condition is dire. Zoey gets spooked. Daniel surprises Pete. Will voices his contempt. Mack and Eddie examine the evidence. Lex is overcome with shock.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E10 Zoey refuses help. Pete and Will clash. Nathan and Orchid connect. Lex informs Pete. Steve and Jo proposition Jack. Katherine prays as Blackwell doubts. Sara hears devastating news.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E11 A family mourns. Blackwell and Katherine receive long-awaited news. An unlikely partnership is formed. Tensions mount when unexpected mourners arrive. Lianna’s joy quickly turns to grief.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E12 Janice and Nardo demand answers. Liza offers Sara forgiveness. Zoey welcomes Vivian. Zoey interrupts Nathan and Orchid. Chase spies on Vivian. Blackwell learns the truth.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E13 Pete remembers Marly. while Vivian comforts him. Blackwell demands Mack arrest Sara. Janice starts to spiral.. Steve opens Marly's casket and gets a major shock.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S1:E14 Pete warns Steve. Sara's arrest angers Lex. Orchid has a close call. Katherine stuns Blackwell. Jack faces his past. Kinyata and Avery talk. Tony silences Sammie. Vivian talks to Pete. Daniel calls Avery. Will tells all. Janice is in peril.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E1 Cleo stuns Pete, and his family with dire news. Steve gains new information. Sara adjusts to her new home. Lianna confronts Riley. Daniel and Vivian witness chaos

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E2 Lola rattles Sara. Jo makes Steve think. Vivian makes a bold offer to Pete. Blackwell stuns. Will and Lianna collide with Pete and Vivian. Janice struggles. A surprise for Sara.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E3 Nathan surprises Sara. Pete, Will, Lianna, and Vivian butt heads. Daniel baffles Avery. Damian stuns Blackwell. Steve and Matthew face off. Janice continues to spiral out of control.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E4 Vivian cautions Pete. Nathan shocks Zoey with his new ambition. Lola’s revelation stuns Sara. Steve plays the peeping Tom. Lianna cuts out Janice. Sara confronts her worse nightmare.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E5 Sara gets surprising news. Vivian pleads with Zoey to keep her secret. Damian warns Lianna. Steve and Jo scheme. Sharon summons Sara to battle with Blackwell. Janice struggles with a chance meeting.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E6 Nathan and Orchid plot. Jack and Pete bond as Janice grieves. Zoey questions Vivian. Sofia, Wife and former lover clash. Lola and Reya plot as Sara attempts to appease Big Candi.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E7 Melody, Jack, and Avery sense trouble when unexpected guests arrive. Zoey gives Vivian options to ponder. Desperation grows between Lex and Sara. A ghost from the past taunts a struggling Janice.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E8 Nathan reveals a delicate secret. With Sara in danger, Lex is caught red-handed while overstepping his bounds. A mysterious man shows interest in Sara and Pete. Janice struggles.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E9 Sara's condition stuns Melody. Janice’s situation grows dire. Lex confronts Steve. Orchid raises questions. Daniel attempts to distract Vivian when Pete and Janice talk. Big Candy and Lola clash.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E10 Pete and Janice make a difficult decision. Big Candi gives a warning. Chase and Tamara heat up. Vivian makes a bold decision. Blackwell has a chance meeting. Eddie and Lex pressure Steve.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E11 Jack gets a visit from his dead wife who attempts to take him down a road from his past where he faces his demons and bittersweet memories.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E12 Avery informs the family when Jack’s condition deteriorates. Karen continues to take Jack on his trip down memory lane when Jack has an epiphany. Blackwell arrives with the intent to finish the job.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E13 Lex wakes to a continuing nightmare. Blackwell deals with mounting suspicions. Janice bears witness to terrifying news. Tamara awakens to a horrifying revelation.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S2:E14 Sara’s attorney comes to town bearing secrets. Janice and Lianna bare their souls, but Janice’s revelation may come too late. Pressure mounts for Blackwell, Steve, and Jo. A secret is revealed!

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S3:E1 Secrets are exposed when Sara comes face to face with her past. Pete and Vivian bond as Janice’s life grows complicated. Daniel panics. Jack extorts Blackwell as Janice shocks Vivian.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S3:E2 Janice makes a surprising offer. Sara and Arthur clash. Tamara is interrogated. Will advises Colton as Blackwell counsels Evan. Evan meets with Liza. Sara stuns Pete with life-changing news.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S3:E3 Vivian assures Pete as Steve and Jo scheme. Colton flirts with Tamara. Orchid confronts Blackwell. After dealing with Vivian, Janice almost gets caught. Sara’s trial begins.

programme.title: The Bay
programme.desc: S3:E4 Sara’s murder trial begins. Orchid leaves Daniel to face the truth. Lianna and Riley come close to discovering Janice’s secret. Nathan infuriates Zoey. Adam’s first meeting with Pete and Vivian.
